verses.text_uthmani: ٱقْتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلْقَمَرُ

translations.text: The Hour has drawn near and the moon was split ˹in two˺.<sup foot_note=77457>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Iqtarabati assaAAatu wanshaqqaalqamar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ ءَايَةً يُعْرِضُوا۟ وَيَقُولُوا۟ سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ

translations.text: Yet, whenever they see a sign, they turn away,<sup foot_note=77458>1</sup> saying, “Same old magic!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-in yaraw ayatan yuAAridoowayaqooloo sihrun mustamirr
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ

translations.text: They rejected ˹the truth˺ and followed their own desires—and every matter will be settled—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakaththaboo wattabaAAoo ahwaahumwakullu amrin mustaqirr
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ

translations.text: even though the stories ˹of destroyed nations˺ that have already come to them are a sufficient deterrent.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad jaahum mina al-anba-i mafeehi muzdajar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: حِكْمَةٌۢ بَـٰلِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ

translations.text: ˹This Quran is˺ profound ˹in˺ wisdom, but warnings are of no benefit ˹to them˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hikmatun balighatun famatughnee annuthur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَىْءٍ نُّكُرٍ

translations.text: So turn away from them ˹O Prophet˺. ˹And wait for˺ the Day ˹when˺ the caller<sup foot_note=77459>1</sup> will summon ˹them˺ for something horrifying.<sup foot_note=77460>2</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatawalla AAanhum yawma yadAAu addaAAiila shay-in nukur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ

translations.text: With eyes downcast, they will come forth from the graves as if they were swarming locusts,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: KhushshaAAan absaruhum yakhrujoonamina al-ajdathi kaannahum jaradun muntashir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ

translations.text: rushing towards the caller. The disbelievers will cry, “This is a difficult Day!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: MuhtiAAeena ila addaAAiyaqoolu alkafiroona hatha yawmun AAasir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا۟ عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا۟ مَجْنُونٌ وَٱزْدُجِرَ

translations.text: Before them, the people of Noah denied ˹the truth˺ and rejected Our servant, calling ˹him˺ insane. And he was intimidated.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohinfakaththaboo AAabdana waqaloo majnoonun wazdujir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَغْلُوبٌ فَٱنتَصِرْ

translations.text: So he cried out to his Lord, “I am helpless, so help ˹me˺!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FadaAAa rabbahu annee maghloobun fantasir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَفَتَحْنَآ أَبْوَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَآءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ

translations.text: So We opened the gates of the sky with pouring rain,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fafatahna abwaba assama-ibima-in munhamir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَفَجَّرْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَٱلْتَقَى ٱلْمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ

translations.text: and caused the earth to burst with springs, so the waters met for a fate already set.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wafajjarna al-arda AAuyoonanfaltaqa almao AAala amrin qad qudir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَحَمَلْنَـٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَٰحٍ وَدُسُرٍ

translations.text: We carried him on that ˹Ark made˺ of planks and nails,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahamalnahu AAala thatialwahin wadusur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تَجْرِى بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَآءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ

translations.text: sailing under Our ˹watchful˺ Eyes—a ˹fair˺ punishment on behalf of the one ˹they˺ denied.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tajree bi-aAAyunina jazaanliman kana kufir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَـٰهَآ ءَايَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ

translations.text: We certainly left this<sup foot_note=77461>1</sup> as a sign. So is there anyone who will be mindful?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad taraknaha ayatanfahal min muddakir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

translations.text: Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakayfa kana AAathabee wanuthur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ

translations.text: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad yassarna alqur-ana liththikrifahal min muddakir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

translations.text: ’Ȃd ˹also˺ rejected ˹the truth˺. Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaththabat AAadun fakayfa kanaAAathabee wanuthur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِى يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ

translations.text: Indeed, We sent against them a furious wind,<sup foot_note=77462>1</sup> on a day of unrelenting misery,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna arsalna AAalayhim reehansarsaran fee yawmi nahsin mustamirr
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ

translations.text: that snatched people up, leaving them like trunks of uprooted palm trees.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: TanziAAu annasa kaannahumaAAjazu nakhlin munqaAAir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

translations.text: Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakayfa kana AAathabee wanuthur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ

translations.text: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad yassarna alqur-ana liththikrifahal min muddakir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ

translations.text: Thamûd rejected the warnings ˹as well˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaththabat thamoodu binnuthur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ

translations.text: arguing, “How can we follow one ˹average˺ human being from among us? We would then truly be misguided and insane.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faqaloo abasharan minna wahidannattabiAAuhu inna ithan lafee dalalinwasuAAur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَءُلْقِىَ ٱلذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ

translations.text: Has the revelation been sent down ˹only˺ to him out of ˹all of˺ us? In fact, he is a boastful liar.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Aolqiya aththikru AAalayhimin baynina bal huwa kaththabun ashir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ ٱلْكَذَّابُ ٱلْأَشِرُ

translations.text: ˹It was revealed to Ṣâliḥ,˺ “They will soon know who the boastful liar is.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: SayaAAlamoona ghadan mani alkaththabual-ashir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَٱرْتَقِبْهُمْ وَٱصْطَبِرْ

translations.text: We are sending the she-camel as a test for them. So watch them ˹closely˺, and have patience.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna mursiloo annaqatifitnatan lahum fartaqibhum wastabir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ ٱلْمَآءَ قِسْمَةٌۢ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ

translations.text: And tell them that the ˹drinking˺ water must be divided between them ˹and her˺, each taking a turn to drink ˹every other day˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanabbi/hum anna almaa qismatunbaynahum kullu shirbin muhtadar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَنَادَوْا۟ صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ

translations.text: But they roused a companion of theirs, so he dared to kill ˹her˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fanadaw sahibahum fataAAatafaAAaqar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

translations.text: Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakayfa kana AAathabee wanuthur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَكَانُوا۟ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلْمُحْتَظِرِ

translations.text: Indeed, We sent against them ˹only˺ one ˹mighty˺ blast, leaving them like the twigs of fence-builders.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna arsalna AAalayhim sayhatanwahidatan fakanoo kahasheemi almuhtathir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ

translations.text: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad yassarna alqur-ana liththikrifahal min muddakir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ

translations.text: The people of Lot ˹also˺ rejected the warnings.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaththabat qawmu lootin binnuthur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَـٰهُم بِسَحَرٍ

translations.text: We unleashed upon them a storm of stones. As for ˹the believers of˺ Lot’s family, We delivered them before dawn
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna arsalna AAalayhim hasibanilla ala lootin najjaynahum bisahar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَن شَكَرَ

translations.text: as a blessing from Us. This is how We reward whoever gives thanks.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: NiAAmatan min AAindina kathalikanajzee man shakar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا۟ بِٱلنُّذُرِ

translations.text: He had already warned them of Our ˹crushing˺ blow but they disputed the warnings.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad antharahum batshatanafatamaraw binnuthur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِۦ فَطَمَسْنَآ أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

translations.text: And they even demanded his angel-guests from him,<sup foot_note=77463>1</sup> so We blinded their eyes. ˹And they were told,˺ “Taste then My punishment and warnings!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad rawadoohu AAan dayfihifatamasna aAAyunahum fathooqoo AAathabeewanuthur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ

translations.text: And indeed, by the early morning they were overwhelmed by an unrelenting torment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad sabbahahum bukratanAAathabun mustaqirr
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

translations.text: ˹Again they were told,˺ “Taste now My punishment and warnings!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fathooqoo AAathabee wanuthur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ

translations.text: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad yassarna alqur-ana liththikrifahal min muddakir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ

translations.text: And indeed, the warnings ˹also˺ came to the people of Pharaoh.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad jaa ala firAAawna annuthur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ

translations.text: ˹But˺ they rejected all of Our signs, so We seized them with the ˹crushing˺ grip of the Almighty, Most Powerful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaththaboo bi-ayatinakulliha faakhathnahum akhthaAAazeezin muqtadir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٌ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ

translations.text: Now, are you ˹Meccan˺ disbelievers superior to those ˹destroyed peoples˺? Or have you ˹been granted˺ immunity ˹from punishment˺ in divine Books?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Akuffarukum khayrun min ola-ikumam lakum baraatun fee azzubur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ

translations.text: Or do they say, “We are all ˹a˺ united ˹front˺, bound to prevail.”?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am yaqooloona nahnu jameeAAun muntasir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: سَيُهْزَمُ ٱلْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ

translations.text: ˹Soon˺ their united front will be defeated and ˹forced to˺ flee.<sup foot_note=77464>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Sayuhzamu aljamAAu wayuwalloona addubur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ

translations.text: Better yet, the Hour is their appointed time—and the Hour will be most catastrophic and most bitter.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bali assaAAatu mawAAiduhum wassaAAatuadha waamar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ

translations.text: Indeed, the wicked are ˹entrenched˺ in misguidance, and ˹are bound for˺ blazes.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna almujrimeena fee dalalinwasuAAur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِى ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا۟ مَسَّ سَقَرَ

translations.text: On the Day they will be dragged into the Fire on their faces, ˹they will be told,˺ “Taste the touch of Hell!”<sup foot_note=77465>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma yushaboona fee annariAAala wujoohihim thooqoo massa saqar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَـٰهُ بِقَدَرٍ

translations.text: Indeed, We have created everything, perfectly preordained.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna kulla shay-in khalaqnahubiqadar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَآ أَمْرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍۭ بِٱلْبَصَرِ

translations.text: Our command<sup foot_note=77466>1</sup> is but a single word,<sup foot_note=77467>2</sup> done in the blink of an eye.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama amruna illa wahidatunkalamhin bilbasar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَآ أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ

translations.text: We have already destroyed the likes of you. So will any ˹of you˺ be mindful?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad ahlakna ashyaAAakumfahal min muddakir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكُلُّ شَىْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ

translations.text: Everything they have done is ˹listed˺ in ˹their˺ records.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakullu shay-in faAAaloohu fee azzubur
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُّسْتَطَرٌ

translations.text: Every matter, small and large, is written ˹precisely˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakullu sagheerin wakabeerin mustatar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَهَرٍ

translations.text: Indeed, the righteous will be amid Gardens and rivers,<sup foot_note=77468>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna almuttaqeena fee jannatinwanahar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فِى مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍۭ

translations.text: at the Seat of Honour in the presence of the Most Powerful Sovereign.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fee maqAAadi sidqin AAinda maleekinmuqtadir
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
